sent.orig: The STAIR (St Andrews Air) cell should be cheaper than today's rechargeable s, too.
sent.trans: 而且，STAIR电池的价格比起现在的可充电电池应当更为低廉。

sent.orig: Subsequent work has more than tripled the capacity to store charge in the STAIR cell.
sent.trans: 后续工作将实现在STAIR电池中储存三倍的电量。

sent.orig: Translated Description: professional production of architectural hardware, stair handrails, stair column, stair fittings.
sent.trans: 专业生产建筑装饰五金、楼梯扶手、楼梯立柱、楼梯配件的厂家。

sent.orig: All rising to great place is by a winding stair.
sent.trans: 凡取得成功的人都走过一段艰难曲折的道路。
楼梯最上面的一级坏了。
